title: Disconnection during Loading Screen
body:
So I talked to a Rioter about trying to get a fix to this and I tried -MULTIPLE- ways to fix it and it still doesn't work :/

I went as far as:-

1) Replacing my Video Driver with an updated one.
2) Using the Clean Boot Guide.
3) Whitelisting League of Legends on Firewall.
4) Closing the gap distance between me the Router. (Wi-Fi*)
5) Reinstalling the Game Twice.
6) Using the Repair Tool on the Client..

What more can I do? ._.    {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
You've done some solid steps so far, but I recommend specifically focusing more on network troubleshooting.  For example, adjusting firewall settings and closing the gap are great, you can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to make sure your firewall settings are configured automatically.  Try the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help as well, as this does sound like your network is struggling to reach the game server.

Not sure where else you spoke to a Rioter, but if it was in a ticket then your best bet is to keep chatting with them.  Your tech specialist will have better context and resources to help dig into this.
